name: Category and Taxonomy Indexer
description: Aggregates category and taxonomy metadata from article frontmatter to generate category pages and browsing indexes, validating category existence and hierarchy consistency.

parameters.output_dir: Directory where taxonomy artifacts will be written
parameters.category_key: Frontmatter key used for categories (default: categories)
parameters.strict: boolean flag to treat warnings as errors

responsibilities: Extract category/taxonomy metadata from normalized frontmatter
Validate category names, casing, and existence rules
Optionally build hierarchical/category-tree structures when available
Emit deterministic artifacts for UI browsing pages
